Text:
My PSP freezes during the Credits, I'd say about 5 mins through them. So if you want to play the EX Game (where you play again with your engraved gun and armor, extra bonus points, and have to tackle the 77-floor maze Crystler Building), this kinda hinders it.

Although considering this is the only DiscFiX'ed version I can find, I suppose the whole game on the first play through is better than one disc.
whenever i try to access it on my psp it says the copyright protection information is invalid.........any ideas
Hopeful to play this game, I'll try to remember to come back and comment after playing it a bit.
